column5: was wondering if anyone has some insight on trolling motors im thinking of getting a long shaft preferbly 50" and at least 70lbs thrust.......have a budget of bout 1000.00   any help would be greatly appreciated    cheers pete
go see jos at angling outfitters you wont beat his price anywhere on his minnkota. I bought a 101 fourtrax for 1100.00
Minnkota all the way.If you buy one make sure you take the option with the auto pilot.
Yup go see Jos at AO....I got a 70pd AP/US unit for a great price.

Minn Kota all the way, but doesn't waste your money on copilot, scheduled to be released in November is the IPILOT, it is going to change the way we fish.  http://www.idofishing.com/forum/showflat.p...ilot-has-landed  I can't wait for Spring.  Jason
I HAVE A CO-PILOT FOR SALE NEXT FEBRUARY!
thanks guys for all the help
